Name: Issue 283
Introduction: Happy Friday!   A bit of a quiet week in the Xamarin blogosphere this week. But still some great articles to keep you busy for the weekend.  ❤ Kym

Articles.Title: Mobile user flows
Articles.Description: A collection of mobile app user workflows - this could make a great reference for you if you are looking for inspiration for your application.
Articles.Author: Waldo

Articles.Title: Replicating Event App UI in Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description: Another fine UI Challenge from Leomaris, this time a great looking Event App UI.
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Sharpnado badge of honor
Articles.Description: The fantastic Sharpnado library now has badges. Who doesn't love badges, right?
Articles.Author: Jean-Marie Alfonsi

Articles.Title: Options for showing and hiding views
Articles.Description: Charlin discusses techniques for showing and hiding content at runtime that don't involve just hiding the content.
Articles.Author: Charlin Agramonte

Articles.Title: Generate QR Codes With C#
Articles.Description: Quick Response (QR) codes are all around us, helping us quickly retrieve information on our mobile devices. QR codes are high-density barcodes that encode all kinds of information: numbers, alphanumeric, byte/binary, and even script languages like Kanji.

Articles.Title: FFImageLoading with a Proxy
Articles.Description: This is a quick tip from Alessandro for getting FFImageLoading working with a proxy.
Articles.Author: Alessandro Caliaro

Articles.Title: Getting Started with Text-To-Speech in Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description: Let’s learn how to work with the built-in text-to-speech engines in Xamarin Forms. Every one of us has different learning styles. Some of us learn better by reading, but others will have better comprehension by listening.
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: How to Add Custom App Actions In Xamarin.Forms app
Articles.Description: How to add custom app-actions to your Xamarin.Forms app using Xamarin.Essentials. This blog post will show you how!
Articles.Author: Almir Vuk

Articles.Title: Keep the Screen On With DeviceDisplayInfo in Xamarin.Essentials
Articles.Description: Gerald has a new video discussing DeviceDisplayInfo. The Device Display Information API in Xamarin.Essentials gives you all kinds of information about the device display. You can see the width, the height, the density, but not only that, you can also prevent the screen from going to sleep.  Also make sure you check out his other videos on his YouTube channel as well, a treasure-trove of goodness for Xamarin developers.
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis

Articles.Title: Null Pointers 24: Testing your apps
Articles.Description: In this episode, we are discussing what approaches you can take to test your hard coded work. From TDD to BDD, we discuss a few of the common Acronym Driven Development approaches and what benefits you want to expect when writing automated code. Tune in and leave us a comment on Twitter.
Articles.Author: Null Pointers

Articles.Title: Merge Conflict 225: Frank Got Catalyst for Xamarin.iOS Working!
Articles.Description: You heard it! Frank Got Catalyst for Xamarin.iOS Working!
Articles.Author: Merge Conflict
